A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's an awesome film and I highly recommend you go. Awesome character development\, great special effects\, and a plot that leaves you guessing until the end of the film. The only reason it loses a hall Star is because of how the movie treats Luke's character. I felt like some of the choices were wrong for him\, but great job by Mark Hammil as always. You definitely need to go!!
